宋緯恩《那一天》迷妹上身　黃雋智引出婆媽腐女粉
05 Nov 2019, 11:30 by 蔡世偉
目前熱播中的戲劇《那一天》，主演宋緯恩、黃雋智、張瀚元、劉韋辰，兩對CP的感情都開始有了進度。另外，因應著熱烈粉絲的支持，12月1日將舉辦《2019 HIStory Party》，屆時會有《那一天》的四為主演、夏恩、夏得、石承鎬、英豪，並有機會邀請到HIStory系列的學長與粉絲同樂，在2019年底，帶給大家一場歡樂派對。
《那一天》劇情來到「蘆筍CP」盧志剛（張瀚元 飾演）與孫博翔（劉韋辰 飾演）兩人跨越了年齡的距離，對彼此的感情更加確認。「香菇CP」中的項豪廷也開始積極熱烈追求「于寶」于希顧（黃雋智 飾演），開始展開撒糖生活。
于希顧飾演高冷學霸，意外吸引許多女生注意，還幫他取名為「于寶」，劉美芳（紀欣伶 飾演）同學，就是于希顧的頭號粉絲，每天偷拍、關注「于寶」的一舉一動，這也引來項豪廷（宋緯恩 飾演）的注意，要與美芳交換于寶資訊，宋緯恩還露一手，示範迷妹上身，尖叫與失控，讓紀欣伶看傻了眼，他笑說：「還是我來演美芳好了。」


宋瑋恩示範迷妹上身。（LINE TV提供）

于希顧過著無父無母，打工求生的生活，常常吃過期白饅頭配水，過去還被項豪廷欺負，為了求生，下跪求項豪廷放過他，讓大家看了都難過不已，黃雋智也是首次對人下跪，其實心中五味雜陳，這也成了他印象最深刻的橋段。黃雋智笑說：「自從演出《那一天》，媽媽、阿姨、阿嬤也都會去LINE TV留言『于寶多吃點』、『于寶好可憐』，或是截圖給我，每天都很關注。」意外發現阿嬤、媽媽是資深腐女。
更新時間｜2019.11.05 11:28

The current drama "The Day", starring Song Weien, Huang Yizhi, Zhang Yuyuan, Liu Weichen, the two pairs of CP's feelings have begun to progress. In addition, in response to the support of enthusiastic fans, the "2019 HIStory Party" will be held on December 1st, when there will be four "The Day", Xiane, Xia De, Shi Chengzhen, Yinghao, and have the opportunity to invite the HIStory series. The seniors and fans have fun, and at the end of 2019, they will bring you a happy party.
The "Day of the Day" story came to "Asparagus CP" Lu Zhigang (played by Zhang Yuyuan) and Sun Boxiang (played by Liu Weichen). The two men crossed the age and confirmed their feelings. In the "Sweet Mushroom CP", Xiang Haoting also began to actively pursue "Yu Bao" in Xi Gu (played by Huang Yizhi) and began to spread sugar life.
Yu Xi Gu played the role of Gao Leng Xue Ba, accidentally attracted the attention of many girls, and also helped him to name him "Yu Bao", Liu Meifang (played by Ji Xinyi), who is the number one fan of Xi Gu, sneak shot and pay attention to "Yu Bao" every day. Song Yuen demonstrates the upper body of the girl. (provided by LINE TV)

Yu Xi has lived a life without a father and a mother, and he has been working for a living. He often eats expired white scorpion heads with water. In the past, he was bullied by Xiang Haoting. In order to survive, he asked him to let him go, so that everyone could see it. Huang Yizhi was also the first to squat on people. In fact, his heart was mixed, which became the most impressive bridge.
